sense.name: a lever that activates a firing mechanism, especially with a firearm
sense.examples: There were not eyewitnesses who saw him pull the trigger of the gun. When you release the trigger on this glue gun, it dispenses glue.

sense.name: an act that sets in motion a course of events
sense.examples: The assassination of the Archduke was the trigger that set of World War I. The dry brush acted like a trigger for the forest fire. The bank defaults were the initial trigger of the short-term credit crunch.
